Medusoid this groundbreaking hybrid of

tissue the inspiration for Medusoid
sprang from an observation that the

of a human heart scientists theorize
that if they could successfully engineer
an artificial jellyfish they could one
day use a similar design to create a
self-powered biological pacemaker or

free the two components of the Medusoid
the silicone base in wet heart cells the

where's the red heart cells have to be

rat
in a manner worthy of dr. Frankenstein

these contractions would make Medusoid
pulse and move the engineering challenge

and making them work in unison it's a

letters that we called this elastic
membrane with a particular protein
it's called fibronectin found on the

there's one more step breathing life
